attributes.action: recognition of stillborn childrens rights to a birth certificate and death certificate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to have the law changed so that stillborn babies be given the rights to a birth certificate and death certificate in recognition of there actual birth regardless weather they are alive and survive for a few minutes  or they are actualy born dead classified stillborn they should have the right to be named and not classified as baby whoever and have a right to a decent burial and buried in a church.
